signals.TimeSeriesSignal.TimeSeriesSignal1 module¶

class signals.TimeSeriesSignal.TimeSeriesSignal1.TimeSeriesSignal1(long_threshold: float = 0.0, short_threshold: float = 0.0, rank: str = 'descending')¶

基类：signals.TimeSeriesSignal.base.BaseTimeSeriesSignal

时间序列信号生成器1

if rank == ‘descending’:

做多因子值大于0的品种，做空因子值小于0的品种

elif rank == ‘ascending’:

做多因子值小于0的品种，做空因子值大于0的品种

rank¶

排序方法, descending表示因子值大的品种做多, ascending表示因子值小的品种做多

Type

str, default descending

transform() → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

生成信号, 1表示做多, -1表示做空, :returns: signal_df – 信号DataFrame, index为交易时间, columns为品种代码, data为信号值- :rtype: DataFrame
